name: The Faded Love Museum
description:
The Faded Love Museum helps people to collect their objects from their broke up relationship. My museum has exhibits area, photo area, interactive area. Every exhibits have their own story, you can see what happened in this object. At the interactive area, my museum has a rainy room, questions and a telephone booth.

I used 4 months to complete this project, during this project, I collected many interesting and moved stories, also many interesting objects, such as the ring, bra and  high heels. I reduced  these things in Maya and put them in my museum with the stories.

During this project, I learned how to build a VR game in unity and also know many interesting stories, VR is very interesting can make people feel real.
